CHAT.comment: BORDEN RANCH PARTNERSHIP AND ANGELO K. TSAKOPOULOS, Petitioners v. UNITED STATES ARMY CORPS OF ENGINEERS, AND ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY S. BISHOP ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY P. MINEAR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY S. BISHOP ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:08 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
